heading: Powered by Open Data
description: Every day, we ingest fresh data from best-in-class sources like OpenAlex and Crossref, ensuring your insights are built on the most reliable and comprehensive Open Data available.

heading: Built on your data
description: We take what you already know—from messy spreadsheets, grant reports, and personal notes—and clean, integrate, and enrich it, turning your data into actionable insights.

heading: Enhanced by our data
description: We collect and curate missing data like Open Code, Grant IDs, and Data Availability Statements (DAS), filling in the gaps to give you unrivaled clarity and a full view on your research output.

heading: Hands-off setup by experts
description: With over a decade of expertise in research transparency, we manage your entire report setup and keep your data current, delivering the latest article insights effortlessly.

heading: Human-driven quality control
description: Our experts perform rigorous quality checks, ensuring your data’s accuracy and reliability. We quickly address reported issues with the data, giving you confidence in every insight.
